content:
Shubhraambaradhaarikallaayo-riru du-thanmaar
Innuyaratthil ninnetthi-kabaringkal ninnu
/tnyangallodothi-aa divyapumaanmaar
/tnirmmalanagare-entaaraayunnu?
Aadatthin vamshatthinmel-sampreethippettu
Doshamashesham sarvveshan-maayichennulllla
/thaaleluyyaa-shaasanamundaayi.

Mrthiyum saatthaanum-sakhiyaam yoodaayum
Chaarchakkaar moonnum-naanichee naallil
Yoodaa kayar nedi-saatthaan lajichu
Raajasuthoththhaanaal-maranam vilapichu
/thaaleluyyaa-haaleluyyaa
Aadatthe veendon-mashihaa samsathyan.
